property.name: server.port
property.description: Specifies the port for external API to bind to

property.name: server.tasks.port
property.description: Specifies the port for internal API to bind to

property.name: server.host
property.description: Specifies the address to bind to

property.name: server.ssl.enabled
property.description: Enable SSl for external API

property.name: server.tasks.ssl.enabled
property.description: Enable SSl for internal API

property.name: server.jdbc.driver
property.description: specifies db driver to use

property.name: server.db.user
property.description: database user

property.name: server.jdbc.max.active.connections
property.description: max active connections to the database

property.name: server.zookeeper.session.timeout.millis
property.description: zookeeper session timeout in milliseconds

property.name: server.zookeeper.namespace
property.description: namespace in zookeeper for the server

property.name: zookeeper.quorum
property.description: Specifies the zookeeper quorum string

property.name: server.scheduler.run.interval.seconds
property.description: seconds to sleep between scheduler runs

property.name: server.solver.num.threads
property.description: number of threads to use to solve cluster layouts

property.name: server.local.data.dir
property.description: local data directory to use when using embedded derby db and in-process zookeeper

property.name: server.task.timeout.seconds
property.description: seconds before a task is timed out

property.name: server.cluster.cleanup.seconds
property.description: seconds between janitor runs, which delete expired clusters and retry timed out tasks

property.name: server.netty.exec.num.threads
property.description: number of exec threads to use for the server

property.name: server.netty.worker.num.threads
property.description: number of worker threads to use for the server

property.name: server.node.max.log.length
property.description: max length in bytes of stdout and stderr to capture from provisioners

property.name: server.node.max.num.actions
property.description: max number of actions to keep in history per node

property.name: server.max.action.retries
property.description: number of times a task should be retried before counting it as a failure

property.name: server.max.cluster.size
property.description: maximum number of nodes allowed for any given cluster

property.name: server.ids.start.num
property.description: id to start at in the database

property.name: server.ids.increment.by
property.description: amount to increment ids by in the database

property.name: server.callback.class
property.description: class to use to handle cluster callbacks

property.name: server.plugin.store.class
property.description: class to use to store plugin resources

property.name: server.plugin.store.localfilestore.data.dir
property.description: data directory to store plugin resources when using the local file plugin store

property.name: server.provisioner.timeout.secs
property.description: seconds to wait for a provisioner heartbeat before moving its workers and deleting it

property.name: server.provisioner.timeout.check.interval.secs
property.description: seconds between checks for timed out provisioners

property.name: server.provisioner.request.max.retries
property.description: max number of times to retry a failed request to a provisioner before reassigning its workers and deleting it

property.name: server.provisioner.request.ms.between.retries
property.description: milliseconds to wait before retrying a failed request to a provisioner

property.name: server.provisioner.request.socket.timeout.ms
property.description: socket timeout in milliseconds to use when making requests to provisioners

property.name: server.provisioner.request.connect.timeout.ms
property.description: connect timeout in milliseconds to use when making requests to provisioners

property.name: server.metrics.queue.cache.seconds
property.description: Seconds to cache queue metrics in memory before recalculating. Queue metrics require walking through the queue and are therefore expensive to compute.

property.name: security.server.token.expiration.ms
property.description: AccessToken expiration time in milliseconds (defaults to 24 hours)

property.name: security.token.digest.key.expiration.ms
property.description: Time duration (in milliseconds) after which an active secret key used for signing tokens should be retired

property.name: security.server.extended.token.expiration.ms
property.description: Admin Tools AccessToken expiration time in milliseconds (defaults to 1 week) (internal)

property.name: security.token.distributed.parent.znode
property.description: Parent node in ZooKeeper used for secret key distribution in distributed mode

property.name: security.enabled
property.description: If this is set to true, security layer will be up and active

property.name: kerberos.auth.enabled
property.description: If true, Kerberos authentication will be enabled

property.name: security.realm
property.description: Security realm used for authentication
